attributes.action: force buisnesses to employ 75% of each shift to british citizens and open up jobs for our 16-17 year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: each shift at work should should have 75% of their workers be british, also that warehouses and factories should stop the non sense of insurance for under 18's, if more 16-17 year olds can get jobs then they can have something to do other than walk the streets. a lot of job agencies dont take on young people and this should be stopped.
